class.name: DiscordppVADThresholdSettings
class.description:
Settings for the void auto detection threshold for picking up activity from a user's mic.
Reference: [url]https://discord.com/developers/docs/social-sdk/classdiscordpp_1_1VADThresholdSettings.html[/url]

method.name: Automatic
method.description: Whether or not Discord is currently automatically setting and detecting the appropriate threshold to use.

method.name: VadThreshold
method.description: The current void auto detection threshold value, has a range of -100, 0 and defaults to -60.
